title: 【特刊】声音背后的科学
intro:
ASMR现象到底是怎么一回事？指甲刮黑板的声音为什么如此令人讨厌？难听的声音通常都有怎样的特点？好听的声音呢？聊聊这“声音背后的科学”。
 
 
  
 
 
 友情提示：本期节目如果佩戴头戴式耳机收听，效果更佳~~
 
 


 
 
 参考资料：
 
 
 1. Libby Copeland“How Researchers Are Beginning to Gently Probe the Science Behind ASMR”SMITHSONIAN.COM MARCH 16, 2017
 
 
 2. Reuter, Christoph, and Michael Oehler. "Psychoacoustics of chalkboard squeaking." The Journal of the Acoustical Society of America 130.4 (2011): 2545-2545.
 
 
 3. Judith T. Krauthamer. Sound-Rage. A Primer of the Neurobiology and Psychology of a Little Known Anger Disorder. Chalcedony Press, 210 pgs.(2013)
 
 
 4. Blauert, Jens, and Ning Xiang.Acoustics for engineers: Troy lectures. Springer Science & Business Media, 2009.
 
 
 5. Zwicker, Eberhard, and Hugo Fastl.Psychoacoustics: Facts and models. Vol. 22. Springer Science & Business Media, 2013.
